data.title: Credits.txt · master · Accensi / Bullet Crew / Bullet
data.text:
-In order to add difficulty, higher tier enemies now have a pain threshold.... · 62f4a396

Mor'ladim authored Jun 19, 2024

-In order to add difficulty, higher tier enemies now have a pain threshold. This means that an attack must deal a certain amount of damage in order for them to flinch, unless they are hit with a certain attack that bypasses this defense, such as from MELEE weapons. -Mass of enemies has been increased. This means they will not be knocked back from effects as far as they previously were, but will take more damage when colliding with enemies or walls as a result. -Small Energy Screen pickups now function differently. They add to a bar that grants one Energy Screen layer once 10 units have been collected. -Reduced amount of Bullet-Eye Energy gained from kills slightly, but Flash Guard blocks (Deflects or not) now grant some Bullet-Eye Energy. -Level 4 weapons now only increase a weapon's damage by 30%, down from 40%. -Weapons with the MELEE weapon sub-type now have the ability to cause enemies to always flinch when damaged. -Decimator effects changed. Rocket brass casings are now launched from free shots durin...
